conclusion: Shadows will change in size and position when the light source moves to the right.
Shadow of the baseball will move to the right.
Shadow of the baseball will become larger.
Shadow of the egg will move to the right.
Shadow of the egg will become larger.
Shadow of the apple will move to the right.
Shadow of the apple will become larger.
Shadow of the microphone will move to the right.
Shadow of the microphone will become larger.
Baseball, egg, and apple will move to the right.
Microphone will remain in the same position on the ground.
Shadows of the objects will become larger.
Summary: Shadows of the baseball, egg, apple, and microphone will all move to the right, and their sizes will increase.
